method.name: i_cal_vcard_geo_new_uri

parameter.name: uri
parameter.comment: The URI value for the GEO

returns.comment: The newly created #ICalVcardGeo holding the URI value

method.comment: Creates a new #ICalVcardGeo holding the URI value.

method.name: i_cal_vcard_geo_new_coords

returns.comment: The newly created #ICalVcardGeo holding the coordinates

method.comment: Creates a new #ICalVcardGeo holding the coordinates.

method.name: i_cal_vcard_geo_clone
i_cal_vcard_geo_get_uri
method.comment: Gets the URI value of the @self. It can return %NULL when not set or when the @self is not of type URI.

method.name: i_cal_vcard_geo_set_uri
method.comment: Sets the URI value of the @self.

method.name: i_cal_vcard_geo_get_coords

parameter.name: out_lat
parameter.comment: a location to store latitude value, or %NULL to skip it

parameter.name: out_lon
parameter.comment: a location to store langitude value, or %NULL to skip it

method.comment: Gets the coordinates value of the @self. It can return %NULL when not set or when the @self is not of coordinates type. The returned strings are valid as long as the @self is not freed nor modified.

method.name: i_cal_vcard_geo_get_coord_lat
method.comment: Gets the latitude coordinate of the @self. It can return %NULL when not set or when the @self is not of type coordinate.

method.name: i_cal_vcard_geo_get_coord_lon
method.comment: Gets the longitude coordinate of the @self. It can return %NULL when not set or when the @self is not of type coordinate.

method.name: i_cal_vcard_geo_set_coords
method.comment: Sets the coordinate value of the @self.
